name: Dungeon Roller (codescapade)
description:
Controls:

Left and right arrow keys to roll.
Up arrow key to  jump if you are right side up or move one tile to the left or right when facing left or right.
Space to shoot your rope. Your rope can pull you toward brown blocks.
If you hold left or right in the air you can shoot the rope sideways if you are not facing that way.

Reach the door to complete the level.

The game is very short. I ran out of time to create more levels.

The game source can be found here https://github.com/codescapade/haxejam-2021-winter

The source of my engine used in the game can be found here https://github.com/codescapade/spirit
